short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free browser extension which hides comment sections. It can work with any site and has settings for many sites built-in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't Read The Comments! is a browser extension which hides comment sections.  It's configurable to work with any site and comes with settings for many sites built-in.

Do you ever unconsciously scroll down the page to read the comments, even though you know you'll regret it? Don't Read The Comments!

DRTC! puts an additional layer of decision between the habitual scroller and the waste of attention that awaits.
